trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The light-hearted hunter is eager to see what you can do.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_TODO_01<tab>Use the leather sack on a weakened Greatwood rail.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the bulging leather sack to the light-hearted hunter.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_000<tab>Well met, ally of Ronka. Did you hear? Almet's recently returned with an astounding catch.

TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_002<tab>Almet is without question one of our greatest hunters, but I am most curious to see how you would fare against them. If you would take up the challenge, meet with me at the Great Pyramid of Ux'ner.

TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_010<tab>You have come. Very good! I care not for how many you can capture, only how it is done. When you have weakened one, use this sack to capture it and bring it back here.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_011<tab>Good luck in your hunt. I will be watching.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_030<tab>I can see now why Almet speaks so highly of you. Your form was unlike anything I have ever seen. But what of the Greatwood rail?
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_031<tab>You have done well not to bruise the feathers or the skin. We can make good use of this.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_032<tab>Yes, such a prize warrants a reward. Meet with me at Fanow and I will see you compensated for your trouble.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_040<tab>For you, oh great hunter, and ally of Ronka.
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_041<tab>I will see this to Almet and─
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_042<tab><gasp> She will ask where is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> quarry!
TEXT_LUCKZF012_03471_VIISHUNTER03471_000_043<tab>What a fool I am. I should have been hunting with you. Perhaps if I can hunt four and offer them together with yours...
